description:
At Verlag Neue Musik, a subsidiary of AMA Verlag, I performed various tasks related to the publication process of musical scores.
The internship was supported by the Erasmus plus traineeship program.
I handled communication activities at the international fair "Cremona Musica." Specifically, I worked on managing the official social media profiles of the fair.

organization: Haydn Foundation of Bolzano and Trento
description: As a production intern at the Haydn Foundation of Bolzano and Trento, I gained experience in the production department.
